---
title: "Data visualisation"

## Summary

This unit of the workshop covers different tools for visualising fossil occurrence data.

This session is led by Sofía Galván and Miranta Kouvari. If you encounter any issues while working with these resources, please contact them [here](mailto:sofia.galvan@uvigo.es) and [here](mailto:kouvari.miranta@gmail.com).
